<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elf Step](/Feats.aspx?ID=21) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 41 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You move in a graceful dance, and even your steps are broad. You Step 5 feet twice.
name: Elf Step
